name: ACCESS (Legal Self-Help) Center
description: Self-help services for family law matters and non-family law cases are available for self-represented Court customers. The ACCESS (Assisting Court Customers with Education and Self-help Services) Center can give you legal information and/or referrals to other resources to help you represent yourself. We cannot provide you legal advice. Assisting Court Customers with Education and Self-Help Services: - The ACCESS Center is available to help both parties to a case, which means we may also help the
